website_summaries.verdict: A durable case meant to protect the phone during everyday use but slipperiness may be an issue for some.
pros: The tough exterior provides good protection, and the raised corners help the user grip the phone
Openings for buttons and the flash are ample
cons: There have been issues with shock absorption and also with the case being slippery

customer_reviews.title: average quality, durability, and lifespan
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad case compared to all the cases I've used and bought for my family. Just average, though. Why? Small plastic bar over the volume buttons cracked at roughly 1 year and shortly after fell off in my pocket. Small cracks starting appearing in year 2. Cracks keep getting bigger even tho the phone has - never - been dropped. Case fits well and is slim enough. It doesn't snag in any of my pockets. Color has kept its integrity. I think the case is better than many but not a top tier product. Price is tolerable but not great.
customer_reviews.author: wandering gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Nice case if you can hold on to it
customer_reviews.text: Nice case, two parts fit together very well. Attractive colors. The phone volume and on/off buttons were not completely covered by the rubber part of the case: Why not? The finish of the hard plastic portion was far too slick/smooth for me and in my opinion definitely needs some surface texture similar to what you find on an Otterbox Commuter. I tried lightly rubbing the the smooth plastic part of the case with steel wool to provide grip, only to discover how thin the color coat was. I bought the Otterbox through Amazon to replace the LUVVITT case.
customer_reviews.author: Bob E.Top Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to love it...
customer_reviews.text: ...I had such high hopes for this particular case, especially following an extensive online research — however, I cannot help but feel a tad bit disappointed. While it is fairly durable and sturdy (I guess depending on both user AND usage), I am not 100% confident it will protect my phone entirely if dropped on a hard, solid surface. The texture may seem slippery for some and the color coating did start rubbing off after a long while, albeit most likely due to normal wear-and-tear. I would recommend this case for "careful" cell phone owners... but not those who, like me, tend to be a little "less careful".
customer_reviews.author: Sweet RjmL

customer_reviews.title: Saved my phone about 10 times so far
customer_reviews.text: I've been heavily using and abusing this case on the worksite as a commercial carpenter for over a year now. I've dropped it so many times on concrete. Each time, my stomach drops and I expect to pick up the phone with a broken screen. I've dropped on the corner which is the big killer. But each time it pulls through! Sleek design and not very bulky. Fits tight and still looks good after a year of abuse. Excellent price too! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: BlockaWood

customer_reviews.title: Saved
customer_reviews.text: I love this case for all its worth. I have always had samsung phones but decided that I wanted to try an apple phone. The first thing I did was to order this case. I can tell you my daughter drops phones and mine is no exception. This case has been a dream. My phone has been dropped alot and it does not have one crack. I thank this phone case for that. If you have an apple phone you must try this case.
customer_reviews.author: karyl34

customer_reviews.title: This case has one job and it does it great
customer_reviews.text: This case finally broke after 3 years being brutally shoved into pockets, falling onto hardwood floors, and being flung onto bookcases, and the part that broke was the part over the volume controls. This thing is super tough. My first year having it, I dropped my phone at the gym and the phone slipped through the railing around the second floor and fell all the way to the concrete covering the first floor. This case protected my phone so well that I didn’t find even a single minute crack. 10/10, will be buying from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Claire Goldman

customer_reviews.title: They look good out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I owned several Luvvitt cases. They look good out of the box, feel nice to touch, not slippery. However, they wear down really fast, about 1 year and major scratches will be present (not a single drop or anything, unsure where the scratches come from as I dont have key in the same pocket with the phone). It has happened to 3 of the cases I own, so I think these are just for shorterm (which is normal cause who used the same case >1 year lol).
customer_reviews.author: Trung

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for thinner case
customer_reviews.text: I really like these cases, have used many of them throughout the years and last very long time. I like that the case is sleek, thin and not bulky like others and still manage to offer great protection. My only issues is the color fades over time, not a big deal but my biggest issue is it’s slippery, I wish the sides had some texture to it so it doesn’t slippery while holding it. Overall a great case and would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Koda Mo

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice case for my iPhone 6. I ordered one red and one black. They are both quite sturdy and I am very happy with them. Strange though that the black and red cases are not exactly the same. The red case has more hard plastic case wrapped around the volume and power buttons than the black one does. I'm sure one is simply a newer design and I would have never noticed if I did not get both. Still 5 stars though.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this case due to the comfort and security when holding it in my hand. It is great drop protection for my phone but after about 2 months, my first case began to peel terribly on the sides. "Flakes" of material began to appear on my screen and on my face after holding the phone to my ear to speak. Since the case did seem to offer good protection for my phone, I purchased another one. I am terribly disappointed to report that this one started to peel and flake after only 2 days. I really wish that the manufacturer could fix this issue because the case would be perfect otherwise. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Fanci411

customer_reviews.title: 3.5 years worked great
customer_reviews.text: It is the end of September 2019. I bought this case in February 2016. It has been perfect. I have dropped my IPhone at least 35-40 times. I have hardwood floors. Some of the drops have been about 2 feet, while others have been in the 3-4 foot range. My phone has never shattered or broken with this case. The case has a few almost minute scratches that one has to look really closely to see. I just bought a new IPhone plus phone and so this case will be retiring. After 3.5 years, I have no complaints. I would buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: SDH SC

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a case like this in 2015 so when I purchased a new phone I knew just what I needed to go with it. I really like that it's easy to hold, sturdy, scratch resistant, and very easy to get on and off for cleaning. I was so glad that this was available in my new phone size so I didn't have to go looking anywhere else. I would highly recommend this case!
customer_reviews.author: Gr8shopper

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone and is not a bulky expensive case
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Luvvitt I have purchased in five years. Not because my first one had issues but because I loved it so much I bought on for my husband and my daughter after years of great protection. My phone has been dropped numerous times from my SUV, out of my pocket and knocked off the counter. No dings or cracks to my phone. I only changed mine out because I accidentally purchased the wrong color for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great stready case keeps your iPhone protect when drops and ...
customer_reviews.text: Luvvitt Ultra Armor case comes with double layer that has a protective hard shell as well as a shock absorbing TPU core. This case is slim and sleek. It gives my iPhone a form-fitting look, providing easy access to ports and buttons. Luvvitt Ultra Armor is clearly for a good level of protection in a really slim profile. Great stready case keeps your iPhone protect when drops and from scratches defiantly recommend price was prefect since you upgrade phone all the time and losing out on case cause it does not fit the new phone is not bad love this case would definitely buy from the seller again as well
customer_reviews.author: kimberly strong

customer_reviews.title: They Stand behind their Product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case almost exactly 2 years ago. Let me say I'm hard on my phones. I dropped it down 2 flight of stairs within 2 days of putting the phone in the case and the phone came out unscathed. Now that the case has protected my phone for 2 years, and multiple drops the outer shell is starting to crack. The case still works but is looking pretty rough. I emailed them this morn expecting them to say it's not covered and they replied immediately saying they are sending me another. I know there's lots of great cases out there but this one is excellent for the money and I appreciate that they stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: DartMan

customer_reviews.title: Bought a second one after the first one broke, three years of use later.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case again after three years of use. Last time held up very well to many drops, never had any damage to my phone. Was removing my three-year-old case last week for maintenance and the plastic piece cracked and broke into multiple pieces. (Wear and tear I suppose) However, this case is slim and durable enough that I wanted to get another one, the last one did extremely well, especially considering the price. Edit; forgot to mention that 2/3 years of use was while in heavy duty restaurant wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: TBits

customer_reviews.title: Excellent protection with a classy look!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome case! I am not gentle with my iPhone. I love this case because it looks classy and is very protective without being really bulky. It also slides in/out of my pocket/purse without getting stuck like those silicone cases do. I have dropped this phone at least twenty times, usually getting out of my van, falling to the cement! I do also have an adhesive screen protector on my phone for those surface scratches. Wipes clean very easily, still looks great and my phone is in perfect condition thanks to this case! I purchased 3 others before finding this one - have had it now for about 6 months - love it!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Burgdorf

customer_reviews.title: Great Case!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical because of some of the other posts but I'm so glad I purchased this case! it fits my iPhone6 perfectly. I was concerned that the case would be to slippery but the grip sides make it easy to hold without feeling like I'm going to drop it. I haven't dropped my phone since I started using the case, I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: JG62

customer_reviews.title: Worth more than this charge!!!
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought it for my son’s phone. He’s 8 and it is sturdy AND protective enough even for HIS SPECIAL BRAND OF CRAZY. It easily holds and keeps his PopSockets, and then easily wipes clean between changes. I’d say it’d be worth at least 2x the cost. It’s ABSOLUTELY worth a try. It looks sleek and Sophisticated, but can easily take the wear and tear!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and value for an iPhone 6 that lives in my pocket
customer_reviews.text: Found this case here on Amazon. Chose my college colors of red and black. Super easy to install. Seems like good protection without too much bulk. Smooth yet sticky: slides out of my pocket easily while still easy to grip. Don’t forget to buy a screen protector!
customer_reviews.author: dcdude

customer_reviews.title: Love this case!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my iPhone 6S. I'm very satisfied with the rose gold color and the quality of the case. It looks more expensive than what I paid for. My daughter who is very selective about phone accessories have been raving about this case for its design and quality. I cannot speak of its duraility as it has been only a couple of weeks since I received it. I would recommend it to everyone who is looking for a reasonable but good looking case!
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color, slippery
customer_reviews.text: I loved this luvvit case and was sad when I traded in my iPhone. It was a beautiful case, I dropped my cell phone multiple times and it never broke. It didn’t come with a scratch proof front so we added a screen protector. It was a little slippery as well but overall great quality.
customer_reviews.author: 1CrazyLife4Me

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fitting FAT CORDS!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first case that I haven't had to take off in order to plug in my Apple iPhone/HDMI adapter cable (slightly fatter than a regular charging cable). The bottom black piece is slightly rubbery/flexible, so even if you had to shove it over to fit a cable, you could! The buttons that go over the hold and the volume buttons are seamless, and feel like a natural part of the phone (great/easy clicking!)! This is the best phone case I have ever gotten for my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great feel!
customer_reviews.text: Not bulky but very good protection, thanks to the extra bumper/cushioning around the outside edges. The volume control and on/off buttons respond nicely with this cover; I had a different cover that didn't allow easy use of the volume/on/off buttons. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: E. S. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: I feel like that can't be correct (a whole year
customer_reviews.text: I had to look back to see when I purchased this phone case...last May 2015? I feel like that can't be correct (a whole year?) since it's still in PERFECT condition. I can't count how many times I've dropped my phone with this case on it, and not once did the case or my phone have an issue afterwards. I'm amazed and will certainly buy these products again since this is honestly the first iPhone case that hasn't let me down. I've dropped my phone on the edge of the case, on the back of it, on the front (screen side), and never did my phone break, crack, nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Janel

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Spigen Slim Armor
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace my Spigen Slim Armor case, which left the screen too exposed. The Luvvitt Ultra Armor has a nice lip that raises the case about 2-3mm over the screen. With the Spigen, even a grain of salt could scratch your screen if you put the iPhone face down. This case eliminates that problem without adding any bulk. I've dropped my phone a few times since getting this case, and although each fall is still nerve-wrecking, the Luvvitt has save it from both internal and cosmetic damage. Great choice if you are unhappy with a case that is either too bulky or leaves the screen vulnerable.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great simple case - can lay phone face down without worrying
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great simple case for my iPhone. I don't like bulky cases but was starting to get nervous about having my phone without a case. Haven't had any scary drops yet but I feel Kiel it will offer a bit of protection. The front of the case stands up enough that I won't be nervous setting my phone on its face. The port cut outs have been large enough for every external device I've wanted to plug into except for one very large audio cable I have. Not the cases fault - the cable it oversized. Cheap dynex from Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have toddlers who love grabbing my phone which usually ends up route and dropping it. This phone case is pretty. It does not scratches on it even though it’s dropped quite a bit. I did order a screen protector to go on it in the screen protector has cracks already but the phone case doesn’t. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: JJO

customer_reviews.title: fit well. everything works.
customer_reviews.text: The cover is substantial enough to protect the phone without being bulky. It fits well on my phone and all the buttons work perfectly. I dropped my phone several times, and the cover seems to offer good protection. Overall I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Chen

customer_reviews.title: So I chose something a little more durable I received it very quickly it is a super tight fit not too bulky but you’re going to ...
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s an iPhone 6 and they’re already on to the iPhone X I still need to take care of it. So I chose something a little more durable I received it very quickly it is a super tight fit not too bulky but you’re going to get a little bulk with the protection no screen cover I would recommend getting a piece of the tempered glass for the front. This is my 3rd case from soft rubber silicone ones two very minimal more design with not a lot of protection, and so far this is my favorite.I would highly recommend .
customer_reviews.author: iheartzombies23

customer_reviews.title: This Phone Case May Be Well Worth Your Money!
customer_reviews.text: When I first had my iPhone 6, this was the first case that I bought and it did extremely well in protecting it! There were a few times that my phone could have been destroyed by my recklessness, yet it didn't even leave a single scratch. As far as design goes, it was decent, but more bulky than what I would like it to be since I like it to appear more 'feminine'. Nonetheless, it did the job of protecting my phone, and it was great value! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: First Case My 18 yo Son Has Left On A Phone - In Years!
customer_reviews.text: My son is rocking this on his IPhone and it's the first case he has left on a phone in years - which indicates he really likes it. He is very tough on phones, breaking a IPhone 6 (twice), and shattering the screens on two Samsung S6s...all in less than 24 months. So far so good on his new IPhone 6 - I think it is because of the case! Thank you LUVVITT!
customer_reviews.author: KAK

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Hard Case
customer_reviews.text: UPDATED REVIEW: I'm upgrading from four to five stars now that I've had this case for a while. It is stylish, extremely durable, and it works great. I dropped my phone on the sidewalk and the case prevented any damage. There aren't even any marks on the case where it hit. Really sturdy hard plastic case. Two piece construction probably isn't really necessary, but it is very secure and does its job. There were some other negative reviews about the buttons on the case not working correctly. I haven't had any issues. The case has a built-in rocker button for the volume, and it works great to turn the volume up or down. I would buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Buzzfuster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent color and protection!
customer_reviews.text: I was initially bummed that the color was a little different than what I saw on my computer monitor, but it has grown on me, and I LOVE it! More importantly though, the fit is fabulous, and it's protecting my phone nicely. I've been using it for about 9 months, and although I'm fairly gentle on my phone, It's fallen out of my purse or pocket several times. Mostly when I'm trying to get out of the car with full arms, so it's landed on the pavement those times. They haven't been huge falls, but between this case and the tempered glass screen protector, the phone has been unharmed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Decent protection for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This case out of the box fits the phone very well and does not add much bulk to the iPhone 6 4.7. It provides a better grip and average protection for the occasional mishap. I purchased this with screen protectors from amFilm (Premium HD) which are amazingly clear and easy to install without dust or bubbles. They also reduce finger print issues and clean with a simple damp cloth. The only complaint I have with the LUVVITT armor is that the rubber base case is a bit sloppy at the bottom. I will be surprised if it last more than a couple of months before it begins to sag from the "when new" snug fit.
customer_reviews.author: Warrior3735

customer_reviews.title: Great product serving well for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: Great product serving well for 1 year, the rear hard case does have a "gap"... not a big deal. After 1 year a small plastic piece from the rear cover going around the silent switch broke and I pulled it off...Not a big deal. After multiple lap sitting with my daughter and car parts landing in my lap, after 1 year the hard back cracked...Not a big deal it protected the phone as it should. (if phone was flipped I would have broke the glass the day I cracked the back).I will buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: steven

customer_reviews.title: This case is amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say.....I think about these wonderful phone case designers with gratitude everyday of my life! I drop my phone ( and baby throws it sometimes) at least five times a day, and it has help up my phone perfectly!!! My phone has a couple tiny cracks in its corner but when it should have been shattered 9374828473 times by now, I can live with tiny non-visible cracks in its corner. I am blown away with how well this case works and I hope they make some really more feminine designs to choose from soon, because I love love this case for saving my phone so much!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, great price, Would, make that HAVE bought again.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it. Then she got an iPhone 7, so I got a Luvvitt case in rose gold for the new phone. It's not Otterbox, but it's sturdy, well cushioned at the corners (they never fall flat, do they?). Good quality, great price, well made, thoughtful design. We aren't looking at "fashion", although for the price, you could buy several for different clothing combinations. Heck, get the camo look for the fall!
customer_reviews.author: johnfcon

customer_reviews.title: If you are a klutz like me - this is the one for you
customer_reviews.text: I break everything. Even if it's unbreakable, I can break it. I've broke countless Otter Boxes and other supposedly unbreakable phone cases over the years. Then I bought this guy. I have dropped it, bounced it, stepped on it, launched it - you name it. Not only is my phone completely unharmed, but the case itself looks untouched. This case is worth every freaking penny! If you are a klutz like me - this is the one for you. And unlike competitors, this case is not clunky and heavy. It is still sleek and fashionable, so you don't walk into a business meeting with your military grade cover on. :)
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: It fits great and has protected my phone on numerous drops
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this case for my IPhone 6 in the gold\black. It fits great and has protected my phone on numerous drops. We got an IPhone 6 for my son, who does NOT think he needs to use a case ever and has cracked many screens on previous phones. We told him he HAS to use a case or no phone Purchased him this same case in the black\black and he has kept it on since it delivered. Just purchased another in the rose gold\black for my daughter for Christmas and she loves it as well. Neither has had a cracked screen since putting this case on. I also love the colors on each of the 3 I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: DePra22

customer_reviews.title: Go Dawgs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case because it got good reviews, but most importantly because it was red and black, the colors of my beloved Georgia Bulldogs. The reason I just gave it 4 stars is because the plastic is harder and more slippery than other cases. That's a good thing when it comes to getting the phone out of my pants pocket, but it doesn't have that reassuring feel of softer plastic. I have never dropped my phone so I really don't know how truly protective any of these cases are.
customer_reviews.author: Ol' J.T.

customer_reviews.title: A solid case that is a good value
customer_reviews.text: These cases are a good value and worth buying. They look great and fit well. Pros: -Nice look -Good protection for the sides of the phone -Easy access for cables -Reasonably priced -Great to use with magnetic vent clips Cons: -Difficult to remove the case from your phone -Scratches easily -It would be great if you could just swap out the hard plastic part instead of having to buy an entirely new case to have a different color. I thought about giving this four stars, but taking everything into consideration, I can't see a reason not to recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Vendura

customer_reviews.title: Saved my iPhone 6!
customer_reviews.text: Well its been almost 3 years since I had this case and it was finally put to the test. Yesterday, I was that guy who doesn't think my phone will come out of my pocket on a roller coaster... of course it did. I would guess I was around 30-40 ft in the air when it slid out and slammed into large stone gravel under the ride. I saw my phone lying there, face down, but it couldn't be retrieved until today. Upon picking it up, I found no damage to my phone but just the case cracked in two places... so it did its job!
customer_reviews.author: Brant E.Johnson

customer_reviews.title: good buy
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug and provides great protection. my phone has dropped many times and there's barely any scratches. It fits so snug however that sometimes its like its become a part of the phone. a little difficult to remove but that's good right? Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Latoya

customer_reviews.title: Provides excellent protection
customer_reviews.text: Definitely provides excellent protection without being bulky. Both my sons have this case on their phones. As responsible as they are, they drop their phones more than the average person & has kept them protected & prevented damage many, many times. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Horvath

customer_reviews.title: Failed a 3 foot drop
customer_reviews.text: While standing, my phone fell, face-down, out of my pocket, onto a flat, concrete driveway. This case did not protect the screen at all. Also, the case (silver one) is a bit slippery wherever it is silver. The black parts have GREAT grip. I have an iPhone6 and took good care of it. I enjoyed the case up until today.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case since I got my iPhone 6, a little over a year ago, and I literally never took it off (except to clean my phone or put on a new screen protector). It kept my phone safe and it survived me dropping it on a weekly basis for over a year. The piece of plastic up by the vibrate switch and volume buttons broke off about a week ago, but other than that the case has literally no damage. My phone has no scratches or chips or any damage at all. Overall, I'd highly recommend this case. It does its job so well that I just bought another one. Also, the purple is beautifully vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: NOT TO BULKY BUT PROTECTS WELL
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a case which protects the IPhone. I also wanted a case that protects the screen. This case is made of two parts. The rubber part protects the phone well and is a good shock absorber. The plastic shell protects the phone even further. Cut outs for buttons and jacks are well placed. They align well with the phone. The cutout for the fingerprint reader is well made as well. This feature is important to me since I use the reader often. Of most importance, a lip exists to protect the screen in case the phone is dropped. In conclusion, this case is well made, small and protects the phone well.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Slightly bulky, but good grip
customer_reviews.text: Slightly bulky, but good grip. Controls are easily accessible. The camera lens does not touch the surface any more, and there is clearance even if you keep the phone screen down on the table. EDIT 8/11/16 - I have dropped the phone at least 10 times on hard surfaces from varying heights, and it has fallen back first, screen side down, corner first, every which way, the phone was never damaged and the glass never cracked. I do have a glass protector on my screen. The case finally gave up after the last drop (metal border cracked), still no damage to the phone. Updating to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Nice case and great color!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Looks and feels great. What can you say about a simple phone case other than it looks like the pic came right on time with prime two day shipping and seems durable enough. For the price it is great. Everything lines up like it should. All the slots and buttons line up perfectly and the headphones seat properly. I hate when you get a cover that things are off like that. So very nice. Seems durable but I just got it so can't comment on that yet but will if there is an issue I will update. I don't think there will be it feels like its made of good quality material and design.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown in picture
customer_reviews.text: Picture made it look like it was a hard outer cover, like the metallic ones, but it’s a soft one. Also made it look deep red color, but the one I received is a bright red that looks almost orange. Not happy with it, but the packaging was thrown out so I can’t return it.**UPDATE: Company contacted and is replacing product with different case. Although I wasn’t happy with original, I am happy with the customer service I received so I changed to 3 stars instead of 1
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very durabale
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone cover I have ever owned. Literally has lasted over a year and still in great condition. I drop my phone frequently so I needed something that could withstand a lot. I also got a screen protector but one of the main reasons my phone is still in great shape is because of this cover case! If I happen to get a new phone I will make sure I purchase this brand again!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jezek

customer_reviews.title: Good protection for a slim design
customer_reviews.text: Cool design for a very good protection. I love that it is not too thick like some other heavy duty iphone case. What's cool about the back plate is it doesn't leave fingerprints and doesn't easily scratched. A very good case to have if you want to keep your phone protected without losing too much of your phone's featured slim design. I dropped my phone once with this case on, it landed on the ground hitting the corner side first and rested with the screen side facing the ground. The corner did not get damaged and the screen did not crack or even get scratched. It is really a great product.
customer_reviews.author: nogz

customer_reviews.title: Bring back the previous generation
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case for a second time, because I really liked the first one. The second one was a little disappointing. The previous gen had solid colours and didn’t slip as much from my hand. The new gen only had the metallic colours and when scratched shows off a different under colour. Please bring back the old ones
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Smith

customer_reviews.title: It is great and I wish I did it sooner
customer_reviews.text: After almost a year with a Lifeproof case, I abandoned the POS for this Luvvitt case. It is great and I wish I did it sooner! I bought the Lifeproof for boating, but it was a royal pain since the case did not fit any adapters/headphones and eventually the silence switch and mic jack piece broke off rendering it useless for water penetration anyways. I love this simple case. It is sturdy, I can find the bright blue in my purse, and the best part... It is an awesome price! Forgot all the overpriced pieces of junk out there and just go with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Running Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this case on my iPhone 6 for a couple of weeks and I have already dropped it and nothing has happened to the case or phone. I can tell this case will be able to withstand quite a few drops. And it surprisingly does not add much bulk to the phone, which was my main concern. I'm not a big fan of the apple logo cutout because dust can get stuck in there and since I'm OCD, I keep getting a cloth to wipe the apple logo...oh well. Overall, a great case and you should get it!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great case at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: It fit my iPhone perfectly and was very snug. There were no gaps, no shifting in the case, etc. unlike other cases I have had. It also is very slim and did not make the phone bulky at all. The back of the case has four small grippy "feet" that help it stay put on flat surfaces. I combined this with a tempered glass screen shield and my phone has survived multiple drops and falls onto various hard surfaces, including tile. I'd love it if they would improve some of their color combinations (very minor complaint) but otherwise I would absolutely buy this case again.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best case for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great phone case. Fits my iPhone 6 perfectly and I've gotten 3 other people to buy the same case already! At $10, you can't go wrong. I like that it has the little rubber feet on the bottom so that the case doesnt slide as much on smooth surfaces. The front of the case also protects your screen very well by being raised enough to not let the screen touch anything when you lay it face down. I use a screen protecter in addition to this case and I receommend everyone else does as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This thing works great, I have dropped my iphone 6 many times where I thought,"dammit I broke it". But when I picked it up nope it was fine, not even a scratch. Not only does it protect my Iphone but it actually made Iphone look better. This is perfect for somebody who has the dropsy with their phone or who sticks their phone in their front shirt pocket.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the the iPhone 5c and the rubber/plastic cover with all the holes on the back side of the phone forever. That's what I was used to and comfortable with. I didn't want to upgrade and get a thick, enclosed-like case I would have trouble getting around myself. This LUVVIT case has exceeded my expectations. It's much more protection than I had before, and very easy to work with when using my new 6s iPhone. I would recommend making this purchase when upgrading both the phone and the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!
customer_reviews.text: This case worked well for me for well over a year. I've been complimented on how clean it looks. I tend to drop my phone a lot and there has yet to be any damage on my phone. The side bit where the switch used to turn your phone to vibrate mode broke off after some point but it still looks and works fine. If you leave it on long enough, it'll make a ring around the apple logo. If you're ocd like me, you don't want that to happen. Just take off the case every once in a while and clean the back too! Anyways, great case! I recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: John Nam

customer_reviews.title: Great budget case
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I both bought IPhone 6's and we wanted slim cases. If you're looking for moderate protection with little bulk, this affordable case is a great option. It's sleek and has nice styling; plastic on the side and back and durable rubber on the top, bottom and corners. My wife purchased a comparable otter box symmetry and I like this better. Pros: Price Durable Stylish No loss of key use Cons: 2 piece design (plastic shell snaps over rubber) Would like better grip on sides
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: I am VERY pleased. This case has a nice feel to it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product since it's very streamline. But, I am VERY pleased. This case has a nice feel to it, and it doesn't seem to slip out of hands as easily as my other case (which was a bulkier protective brand). With that being said, it has been through a couple of drops (I'm just a phone dropper, what can I say) with no evidence of damage to my phone...AT ALL. I love this case!!! I bought the pink/black case and it's very sweet looking, I've had many compliments on it. I will definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Love 2 Shop

customer_reviews.title: Great iPhone case!
customer_reviews.text: I like this case a lot!! I would compare exactly to the Otterbox Commuter which is what I replaced with this. You also should have a screen protector which you can purchase separately. It's a really nice iPhone case and more reasonably priced than its competitors!
customer_reviews.author: Cakie

customer_reviews.title: It Fits
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to go with an iPhone 6s I gifted to my son. He had no trouble putting it on the phone, says it’s comfortable to hold and seems pretty sturdy. It is not a soft silicone. It is hard but not cheap and brittle. He likes it. That’s what matters to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Comparable to some of the brand name cases. Using on sons phone as he likes to switch them out. Looks good and has held up. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper's mom

customer_reviews.title: but it provides good protection. One of thing I don't like is ...
customer_reviews.text: The case doesn't add that much bulk to the phone, but it provides good protection. One of thing I don't like is the fact that back of the phones gets greasy very fast. I have to repeatedly wash my hands and clean it throughout the day or else it'll look terrible. Aside from that, my other complaint would be that it's too difficult to put on and take off. Every time I take it off I live in fear of breaking my phone so I just leave it on the majority of the time. I don't want to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: beautiful and sturdy....but slippery.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I give this four stars is the back is very slippery and I have dropped it more since I put it in this case. I switched to this from a speck case. The case is beautiful. The black and gold case makes my gold and white phone look very classy in the case. The case looks expensive yet was the most affordable one with protection I could find. It does have a lip on it but it seems lower than my speck case. I have a tempered class screen protector on it as well so I am hopeful this will combination will work. Overall, just a beautiful case at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hitchins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be the best case in the similar design category. I purchased a red case of one other brand, which is much worse than this one, in terms of color, easy access to the volume/power button, and accuracy of the size. If you want me to be really picky, then maybe the only problem is that the back case is a little too smooth. It might be a problem since I have a small hand, and it is just a little slippery.
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: I do love it!
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits like a glove and it's thin and the blue is a great color. I think it provides really good coverage. I've dropped my pone a few times and it lives on. Know it's not like an Otterbox. It's not that heavy duty but that's why it feels great and is not so bulky. The materials are kind of stiff and won't rip like the rubber on other cell phone covers I've had. And if I have to take it off, I can. I don't have to go thru changes to get it off. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Mizz K

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected...so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've always turned to Spigen for my phone cases, but after buying the new iPhone 6, I've heard some bad things about how their iPhone 6 cases would crack and fall apart. So I took a chance buying this case and am glad I did. The quality feels nice, snug, and sturdy. The back finish is a smooth matte so it doesn't scratch if it were glossy which is practical. The buttons work flawlessly and the bottom is just thin enough to dock the phone. I don't expect this case to protect my phone if I threw it in the air, but it should be alright if it slips out of my hand at waist level.
customer_reviews.author: LM_ATX

customer_reviews.title: Works like  charm!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure it has been a year or more since I bought this product. No complaints. Works like a charm. Although I'm not prone to drop my phone, I've dropped it quite a few times and my phone is just like new. Attached are two pictures of my case's current state after daily use for more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle  M. Cordero-Soto

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, lovely color, easy to apply to phone.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the color first off, it's very durable, easy to hold and doesn't come apart easily or scratch. It does scuff up some, but not easily. Would purchase again and I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J R n Texas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. When I've dropped the phone before putting the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about a week. So far so good. When I've dropped the phone before putting the case on, the sound of it hitting the floor always made me cringe. I have dropped it once or twice with the case and the sound is much less frightening. Although so far the phone hasn't been damaged either with or without the case being on. Everything is accessible and the case feels comfortable in my hand. The phone is so light weight that I always felt like it was very fragile. The case adds some nice weight to it without being bulky. All said, for the price, it's a great case.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Embree

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Big Brand Name Cases
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this a little over a year, and it has little damage. I carry my phone in my pocket and have dropped it several times on gravel and concrete with no real effect on this case or the phone. The only damage is on the thin sections of plastic between the buttons, which have cracked. This is not and will not be a problem for me as I continue to use the case. My wife and mother and father in laws have the same case in different colors, and all have had similar experiences.
customer_reviews.author: Mac15

customer_reviews.title: I only got it to make my phone look nice and for slight protection
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what this is made of, but it's indestructible. I've dropped, kicked, and tossed my phone only for it to come out without a scratch. I only got it to make my phone look nice and for slight protection, but I got a lot more than that. It's protected my phone more than the more expensive cases like otterboxes. It's tough to take off, but you'll never want to. It's stiff to put on too, but because it's inflexible you have to do it carefully and slowly so it doesn't snap. Awesome case I'd definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: kohpee

customer_reviews.title: I love this case
customer_reviews.text: I love this case! It can be a little slippery and yes, I've dropped it before. I thought it was going to crack my screen but it didn't. I did buy a tempered glass because there wasn't a screen cover and it leaves a very little gap that isn't protected. I didn't see that it was a problem but that's my opinion. It's thin, sleek and a great color. It's also very snug but I don't think it would be an issue taking it on/off. It was coincidence too that my boss has the same one! I would definitely recommend this case to others!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lieu

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone protection!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the color and the design. Good to excellent protection. Didn't come with a screen protector but still a good purchase either way. The various usb, headphone and device plugin outlets are properly placed so as to cause NO issues whatsoever. I also felt that this item was priced reasonably! I highly recommend purchasing from this seller and would not hestitate to purchase additional items! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Darstein

customer_reviews.title: Perfect phone case
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this iPhone case. A little bit rubbery, so easy to hold and secure in my hand. I’ve dropped the phone a few times anyway... and very good protection. Lovely red color.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Z

customer_reviews.title: Well covered with this buy
customer_reviews.text: This fits the 6s perfectly. I started to be concerned after reading that not all 6 cases fit the 6s phones, but no need to worry with this one. Like most cases built for protection, this one adds to the thickness of the phone. I compared it to my old 4s, and it's ever so slightly thicker, really unnoticeable. The side switch and both plugin ports are easily accessible, buttons are responsive and easy to press, while the camera and speaker are completely unobstructed. This is a great case for the price!
customer_reviews.author: BuyerOfThings

customer_reviews.title: This case is amazing. I thought because it is so slim that ...
customer_reviews.text: This case is amazing. I thought because it is so slim that it wouldn't last. It has been about a year and it has a few scratches but barely noticeable. I drop my phone at least 2-3 times a week. I have tempered glass on my screen which has helped as well. This has fits so snug that it is a pain to get off, to me that means it is doing what it should and that is protect my phone. I will probably be buying it again once I get an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Fits Snug, Feels Slippery
customer_reviews.text: Fits snug, Feels slippery and insecure. Display side is too thin. It just doesn't feel like it's as protective as my last one was. There are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Dopy Doorite

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, this is the best iphone case I have ever had. I've been usint ir for almost two years now and it has protected my phone from day one. I am a frequent dropper too, and despite I have tried other cases (to change the looks of my phone) I still haven't found anything better. My phone looks like new.
customer_reviews.author: Anonimous

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp, sleek design, great grip. Lots of compliments
customer_reviews.text: This case fits on the iPhone 6 in seconds and protects it from bumps and scratches. It makes the buttons on the sides much easier to use and this is a great case but remember it is not an OtterBox so if you are prone to dropping your phone maybe go with a more expensive water proof case. However this case is very sharp, sleek design, great grip. Lots of compliments. I definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: YG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our son for his first iPhone. We handed him down my old iPhone 6 and he loves the case. It’s very well made and fits great securing any accidental drops
customer_reviews.author: Marla

customer_reviews.title: Well made, attractive case!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice well made attractive case that adds to the beauty of my iPhone 6. This case feels good in my hand, all of the ports are aligned perfectly and it snaps on and off with relative ease. I refuse to purposely drop my iPhone so until that accidentally happens I can't offer a report on how well it protects your iPhone when dropped. Addendum: One thing I've noticed since I've been using this case is the added degree of pressure needed when you press the Power On/Off button. It's taking some getting used to, other than that, I'm quite satisfied with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: TC Conner

customer_reviews.title: Feels Good
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and my phone feels so much safer now. T-Mobile tried convincing me to spend around $80 on a case from them when I got my iPhone, but I knew I could come to Amazon and save a ton. The reviews, price, and yes, the color, convinced me to purchase this product. I went ahead and got one for my other half as well. We have both been very happy with it and it has withstood being bounced around in my purse, handled by my toddler and baby, and being dropped a small distance twice.
customer_reviews.author: In My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: Holds up really well
customer_reviews.text: I have had this case on my phone for months now and it has protected it against me dropping it daily! I was really unsure about ordering this because I have always had otter boxes or life proof cases but this has stood up to my rough test. I also have a tempered glass screen protector that is on and has had to be replaced but this case has protected the rest of my phone and it's not big and bulky like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan & Erica

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: This case started falling apart pretty soon and had to replace it shortly after using it. The plastic is too brittle and the corner broke. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Danco Mellodine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've dropped my phone numerous times, and not even the glass screen protecter has been affected! The bright color makes it easy to find the phone when I shove it into my purse, and the cover is slim enough that it fits in a pants pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Sigrid Undset

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  Significant Color Wear after 3 Months
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. After only 3 months of use the gunmetal color on my case started to wear away at the edges. This is my second Luvitt case same model. My previous lighter silver color seemed to last longer but did ultimately replace it due to the same color wear. I now switched back to Otter Box and expect better longevity.
customer_reviews.author: jkl

customer_reviews.title: Good case!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. It is not too bulky but definitely offers great protection. It is easy to put on and take off, it's not difficult to push the buttons on the side of the case like some cases that are too thick and takes monster strength to push the volume/ lock button; and the solid colors are perfect. I would recommend this case to anybody who wants to ensure their phone is protected but don't want the bulkiness of an otter box (or the price) great buy. Shipping for this item was also very prompt.
customer_reviews.author: natalie a.

customer_reviews.title: A great little case, very protective and attractive!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little case, very affordable, and does not restrict usage of the ohone in any way. I am returning the other case my daughter purchased, and ordering more of these! It is quite durable as well, our phones get dropped a lot, and not one has been damaged. It has not been tested on a tile floor, but so far wood, pavement, and concrete are not a problem! The only drawback is not made in the USA.
customer_reviews.author: A BUSY MOM

customer_reviews.title: Definitely durable
customer_reviews.text: As a frequent dropper of items I can attest to the durability of this product. My iPhone is crack-free for 4+ years now with this case. The case has chipped a bit and shows scratches pretty easily, but I really like the look and feel of it, not to mention the fact that it's kept my phone alive this whole time.
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Case; Excellent Protection!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful phone case, especially in this blue color. It looks very one of a kind! The protection is on the quality of an Otterbox Commuter series, without the bulk of that case. I would say maybe half a size thicker than a standard bumper style case.
customer_reviews.author: stonercrazyclips222

customer_reviews.title: The color is great. I recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I got this case in nearly 8 months ago, and this case has held up astonishingly well for the price. The case has only now started to show some scratches and signs of wear. I've dropped my phone numerous times, and my phone hasn't cracked or scratched. There is a lip that rises slightly above the plane of the screen face to protect the screen from shattering if you drop it facedown. The color is great. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Alice S

customer_reviews.title: Luvvit Luvvit Luvvit
customer_reviews.text: Like the name implies, Luvvit!!I probably read every review before I order a product. Some people say it's heavier and slippery. It is heavier than my previous case but in a good way. I love the look and feel of this case. The gold color looks classy and matches well with my phone and iPad. I drop my phone several times a day. With this case paired with the tempered glass screen protector, my phone still looks brand new! 😍
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Rugged and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our 12 year old who has shattered her screen in the last. She loves this case and we do too. No problems since switching to this case, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent and Jane Taype

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PHONE INVESTMENT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: This phone case is absolutely amazing. I've had it for about four months now and it has done wonders. I'm a college student - Nonetheless, I go out often and find myself dropping my phone everywhere. I've drop my phone in the toilet, off a bunk bed, off a four foot table, off my desk, everywhere! And guess what? My phone is like brand new.. the scratches on the screen, no shattered screen, no scruffs on the phone - it is in mint condition still! Buy this phone case, it will not disappoint. The case itself seems indestructible; after all those falls, it looks like brand new still!
customer_reviews.author: Snowy

customer_reviews.title: Great protection and very Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughters birthday for her new phone. The color was perfect. The case is very tightly held on to the the phone. Its got great protection all around the phone and a big enough lip on the top that if dropped I hope it will save the screen. My only want on this phone would be to have some grippy plastic on the side so it would be easier to hold firmly in your hand. But overall I would buy this again and my daughter is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: twobit foodie

product_meta.title: iPhone 6 Case, 6s Case LUVVITT [Ultra Armor] Shock Absorbing Case Best Heavy Duty Dual Layer Tough Cover for Apple iPhone 6 / iPhone 6s (4.7) - Black
feature_bullets: IPHONE 6s CASE / 6 CASE : NEW Updated design compatible with Apple iPhone 6 (2014) and the new iPhone 6S (2015)

SOLID CONSTRUCTION: Double layer armor case design combines a protective German Bayer branded hard shell and a shock absorbing TPU core. LUVVITT ULTRA ARMOR iPhone 6 / 6S Case only fits 4.7 inch screen iPhone 6 / 6S. Search our other listing for iPhone 6/6S PLUS version of the same item.
SLIM and MILITARY : Very sleek yet durable and protective. Ultra Armor case for iPhone 6S / 6 provides the best protection level. It has successfully passed the military test standards.

PROTECTIVE LIPS : 1.4mm lip above the screen level (lay on table design) ensures your iPhone 6 / 6S screen is protected. The back of the case also features tiny nubs (4-point rear guards) on corners that elevates the back of your iPhone 6 case to prevent scratches to the back of your iPhone 6 / 6S case.
EASY ACCESS and EASY PRESS BUTTONS: Quick and easy access to ports and buttons. Innovative new button design ensures an extremely easy to press button experience for your iPhone 6 / 6S.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars8,482 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
